attributes.action: stop supporting Israeli genocide in Gaza
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gaza is an occupied teritory. Hamas is reacting to occupation just as the resistance did in Nazi occupied Europe. Israel has turned Gaza into a ghetto, similar to those in Poland created by the Nazi's. If the USA/UK's actions in Iraq can, in any way, be condoned, then surely, considering Israels disdain of the UN, murder of children, use of illegal weapons, etc. our support is even more dispicable.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
